extendedInfo.description: This application allows you to search for Russian videos by typing in two languages - Russian & English - simultaneously via a 'Hybrid' keyboard, as well as using speech recognition.  The Hybrid keyboard types English letters to output Russian letters, and vice versa.  It uses Translit.ru-style letter mappings.  Additionally, the app offers a standard Russian keyboard, and also an English keyboard.  You can then search YouTube and Yandex video sites, as well as Google.  It also saves your search history locally.Features:-Supports Google TV with Logitech Revue-Russian on-screen keyboard, and a button to switch to English keyboard-Button for Hybrid keyboard (type in English & output Russian letters)-Voice search buttons for Russian and English-Saves recent search history -Colored icons in tabs for YouTube, Yandex and Google-Support for landscape and portrait mode

reviews.title: DOES NOT SUPPORT Logitech Revue in later versions!
reviews.comment: Good program, however the keyboard support is lost in the latest version, at least for Logitech Revue. Only mose can be used now, with on-screen keyboard, with is much slower interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very easy to use
reviews.comment: Combines us an russian keyboard in one app and makes things easy to type and search.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app for us Russians
reviews.comment: Wow, I\'m really impressed with the Russian keyboard, as well ad the Hybrid keyboard.  I also love the ease with which you can search for Russian videos and save the search history locally.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice layout, and useful Russian keyboards
reviews.comment: The input keyboards made available in this app are great.  They are neatly laid out.  The hybrid keyboard, especially, is unique - I have not seen any other international keyboard app implementing anything like it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: I like the neat Russian keyboard.  Also, the Hybrid keyboard is convenient - like Translit.ru.  And it\'s great that the app saves your searches on the device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seems useful
reviews.comment: I used to find myself needing to type in Russian, only to copy the text and search on another site for videos.  This app saves me the extra steps, and gets right down to finding Russian videos simultaneously.
reviews.author: A Google User
